TopicTitle: Building and flying a space shuttle (.25)

Articles.Content:
Here is a video tutorial showing how to build and fly a realistic space shuttle using only stock parts.

The ship in the video can be downloaded at - https://www.dropbox.com/s/mux4ddewl78hirp/Shuttle.craft?dl=0
Very cool. My problem isn't building one, it's landing it. I can land just fine if I have jet engines, but I have yet to land anything unpowered

I've found that landing an unpowered aircraft it's better to drop in very steep to keep your speed up, in the video I over shoot slightly but I had a little bit of fuel left to make the turn. An easy modification on that ship would be to swap the small rocket for a rapier and then add an intake or two. It shouldn't effect the thrust balance too much but the lower efficiency should be taken into account.
Really good tutorial. Finally launched a space shuttle.

My issue is that when using mechjeb, i believe i dont have enough speed and when it circulizes, i am still burning far past the ap thus one side is 130km and the other is 118km. Any idea how to set a better trajectory via mechjeb?
